subject: Re: Most Haunted & The Box
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi April,

Cool news!  I'll make sure to tune in.  It's always good when the 
sweeping band boxes get in the news or on the TV and radio.

Is this the prototype that sweeps the AM, and a bit above and below 
that band?

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Slaughter" <aprilrebuilt@...> 
wrote:
>
> Just thought I would drop in to let you all know that Dr. Ciaran
> O'Keeffe has borrowed a Mini from our team (the initial prototype) and
> will be using it tonight during part of their investigation in
> Gettysburg. It is a LIVE event tonight on the Travel Channel beginning
> at 8 p.m. EST. It will be interesting to see what they catch with the
> box, if anything! :)
>
